section.title: Past simple: irregular verbs
section.sectiontitle: In the Past simple, many verbs are irregular. For example: go – went; write – wrote; sing – sang; meet – met.
section.text1a: J. K. Rowling wrote the Harry Potter books.
section.sectiontitle2: There are no rules for irregular verbs! The Past simple is the same for I, you, he, she, it, we and they.
